text: Anthony Mark "Tony" Mowbray (born 22 November 1963) is an English former professional football player and the current manager of Coventry City. Mowbray played for Middlesbrough, Celtic and Ipswich Town as a defender. Mowbray was born in Saltburn-by-the-Sea, North Riding of Yorkshire.
